structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Acceptance of military training and service toward certification as firefighter -- Administrative regulations.

text.section: The commission shall develop a policy for reviewing and accepting the training and service of any member of the United States military who served as a firefighter towards certification as a firefighter in the Commonwealth of Kentucky.
The commission shall promulgate administrative regulations in accordance with KRS Chapter 13A as necessary to implement the provisions of this section.

law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 153, effective June 25, 2013.
